/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a corridor of urban life. A blue traffic sign stands prominently on the right side of the road, guiding the flow of vehicles. The sky above is hazy, casting a soft light over the scene. In the distance, a bridge stretches across the horizon, connecting different parts of the city. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the blend of urban architecture and natural elements.
